quiz.question: Which blood component is stored at room temperature with gentle agitation?
Who discovered the ABO blood group system in 1901?
Which blood product is prepared by freezing plasma within 24 hours to preserve labile clotting factors?
Which antibody class primarily mediates immediate ABO incompatibility reactions?
Which red cell storage additive allows refrigeration up to 42 days in many systems?
Which screening marker window period risk do nucleic acid tests reduce in donor screening?
Which blood type is considered the universal plasma donor?
Which antigen system is most clinically significant after ABO and Rh for transfusion?
Which maternal intervention after delivery prevents Rh D alloimmunization in sensitizable mothers?
Which organ commonly requires ABO compatibility for transplantation?
Which laboratory test screens recipient serum for unexpected antibodies against donor cells?
Which neonatal test quantifies maternal IgG bound to fetal red cells in vivo?
What does the Rh factor determine in blood typing?
Which product is given to correct coagulopathy rapidly in trauma settings?
Which strategy extends platelet shelf-life by reducing bacterial contamination and viral risk?
